name: Sniper Hunter Pro: Jungle Anim
description:
Sniper Hunter Pro: Jungle Animal is a professional hunter when hunting wild jungle animals as an amateur killer of wild beasts. A real hunting and shooting game with sniper and assault guns that you might not get in your real life. Player of this game experience a real hunting experience as a hunter in jungle with out the risk of their life. As a hunter with a special sniper and assault guns and pistols to shoot wild jungle animals.
FEATURES:
- Real 3D Graphics.
- Game Play is simple yet entertaining.
- Easy To Control
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Multi-touch enabled.
